chart.title: Unemployment rate
chart.subtitle: Share of the labor force without work but available for and seeking employment.

Unemployment rate - Percent of total lab.titleShort: Unemployment rate - Percent of total labor force - Observations
Unemployment rate - Percent of total lab.titleLong: Unemployment rate - Percent of total labor force - Observations
Unemployment rate - Percent of total lab.descriptionShort: Unemployment refers to the share of the labor force that is without work but available for and seeking employment.
